socketpp::SocketServer

socketpp::SocketServer Class Reference

TCP server class which can accept simultaneously multiple connections through multithreading. More...

#include <SocketServer.h>

Detailed Description

TCP server class which can accept simultaneously multiple connections through multithreading.
